title: Gather Requirements
description: Collect and document requirements for the BurnoutPredictionAlert system, including data sources (e.g., work hours, task assignments, deadlines), prediction models (e.g., machine learning algorithms, training data), user interface (e.g., dashboard, notifications), and alert mechanisms (e.g., email, push notifications).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the system, including components, data flow, integration points, and key considerations for maintainability, scalability, and performance. The architecture should include the following components: 1) Data Collection: Mechanisms to collect user work patterns, schedules, and other relevant data. 2) Data Processing: Pipelines for cleaning, transforming, and preparing data for model training. 3) Machine Learning Model: A predictive model to identify potential burnout based on the processed data. 4) Intervention Engine: A component to generate personalized suggestions and interventions based on the model's predictions. 5) User Interface: A web or mobile application for users to interact with the system, view predictions, and receive suggestions. 6) Monitoring and Alerting: Mechanisms to monitor system health, performance, and data quality.

title: Develop Data Collection and Processing Pipeline
description: Implement the data collection and processing pipeline to gather and prepare data for the prediction model.

title: Build Burnout Prediction Model
description: Develop and train the machine learning model for predicting burnout based on work patterns.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for displaying predictions and suggestions.

title: Develop Alert and Notification System
description: Implement the alert and notification system for proactively suggesting work-life balance improvements.

title: Set up Testing and Continuous Integration
description: Establish testing frameworks, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines for the project.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a security audit to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the system.
dependencies: Develop Data Collection and Processing Pipeline

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance procedures.
dependencies: Develop Data Collection and Processing Pipeline

title: Deploy and Monitor
description: Deploy the BurnoutPredictionAlert system to production and set up monitoring and logging mechanisms.
